item.title: Airplane Auction: The $17,500 Surprise
item.description: What starts as a routine auction turns into an unexpected win when a plane sells for far less than expected. Here’s the story behind the bidding, the condition of the aircraft, and the surprise final price.

media:content.media:title: Airplane Auction: The $17,500 Surprise
media:content.media:description: What starts as a routine auction turns into an unexpected win when a plane sells for far less than expected. Here’s the story behind the bidding, the condition of the aircraft, and the surprise final price.

item.title: Abandoned Plane Revival: A 12‑Minute Journey from Dust to Flight
item.description: A forgotten aircraft gets a second chance as the team works through inspection, repairs, and a test flight — all captured in a fast‑paced 12‑minute story of restoration and return to the sky.

media:content.media:title: Abandoned Plane Revival: A 12‑Minute Journey from Dust to Flight
media:content.media:description: A forgotten aircraft gets a second chance as the team works through inspection, repairs, and a test flight — all captured in a fast‑paced 12‑minute story of restoration and return to the sky.

item.title: 1952 Bonanza Models Are Known for Serious Corrosion Issues
item.description: Early‑1950s Bonanza aircraft have a reputation for major corrosion problems. This breakdown looks at where the issues typically appear and what buyers should watch for before taking one on.

media:content.media:title: 1952 Bonanza Models Are Known for Serious Corrosion Issues
media:content.media:description: Early‑1950s Bonanza aircraft have a reputation for major corrosion problems. This breakdown looks at where the issues typically appear and what buyers should watch for before taking one on.

item.title: Only $2,500 and No License Required
item.description: This unusual find comes with a surprisingly low price tag — and doesn’t even require a license to own. Here’s what makes it so accessible and why it caught so much attention.

media:content.media:title: Only $2,500 and No License Required
media:content.media:description: This unusual find comes with a surprisingly low price tag — and doesn’t even require a license to own. Here’s what makes it so accessible and why it caught so much attention.

item.title: Snowmobile‑Powered Airplane: Will It Start After Years?
item.description: This unique airplane runs on a snowmobile engine — but it hasn’t been started in years. Watch the attempt to bring it back to life and see if the engine fires up.

media:content.media:title: Snowmobile‑Powered Airplane: Will It Start After Years?
media:content.media:description: This unique airplane runs on a snowmobile engine — but it hasn’t been started in years. Watch the attempt to bring it back to life and see if the engine fires up.
